articles.content:

articles.title: Coronavirus in Kansas: 6,984 confirmed cases, 157 deaths - KAKE
articles.description: Kansas reports the the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the state rose by 132 on Monday to 7,116.
articles.content:
TOPEKA, Kan. (KAKE) -
 Kansas reports the the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the state rose by 132 on Monday to 7,116.
The Kansas Department of Health and Environment data shows an increase of one death to 158. The state reports 660 hospitalizations,… [+1139 chars]

articles.title: Study finds that people who have coronavirus could die 10 years early - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Glasgow found that a coronavirus diagnosis might shorten life expectancy by 10 years, even despite a full recovery.
articles.content:
Researchers have found that a COVID-19 diagnosis might have more detrimental consequences than one might expect. 
On average, you can lose more than a decade of your life to the novel coronavirus — even if you've recovered from a virus — according to a recen… [+1706 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus Found In Semen: Can It Be Sexually Transmitted? - Forbes
articles.description: A new study found COVID-19 in semen of male patients.
articles.content:
Coronavirus was found in semen of recovering and acute male COVID-19 patients in a small study conducted in January and February in China, though it remains unknown, according to the CDC, whether the disease can be transmitted sexually.
